(2,): As a data submitter, I want to create a new submission, so that I can upload my files for processing As a data submitter, I want to view my submission details, so that I can verify its information As a data submitter, I want to publish my submission, so that it can be processed and shared As a DABS user, I want to generate a D file, so that I can access processed data
